name: HarryRabby 2 Find Number from Percentage FREE Version
name_original: HarryRabby 2 Find Number from Percentage FREE Version
description:
Looking to test your kid’s basic math skills? We have what you need here! This special series of HarryRabby 2 includes products for learning different elementary to intermediate level math topics.

This is an action packed math game with levels of fun and excitement. Having accessibility in mind, special display and control features are available for low vision gamers. Many game elements are adjustable, such as object moving speed and color mode (high contrast, brightness, grayscale, B&W, inversed display…etc).
Simple but challenging gameplay, with mobile touch screen support, the games can be played on mobile devices as well as on desktop computers.

The math questions are specifically made for elementary and intermediate learners. Player clicks or touches on the correct answer to a math question in order to allow HarryRabby to land safely and proceed to the next level. The math questions are generated randomly. The full versions have 5 difficulty levels. The free version has just one.

In this game, you need to find the number corresponding to the percentage of the given value, which is generated randomly and is ranging from 200 all the way to 1000.
